author: Zack Budryk
title: Pennsylvania state senate votes to override governor's stay-at-home order
description: The Pennsylvania state senate on Wednesday sent a bill that would partially lift the lockdown on most of the state's businesses to Gov. Tom Wolf's (D) desk.The measure, Senate Bill 613, would require the governor's...
content:
The Pennsylvania state senate on Wednesday sent a bill that would partially lift the lockdown on most of the states businesses to Gov. Tom Wolfs (D) desk.
The measure, Senate Bill 613, would require the governors office to align with federal guidelines in de… [+1905 chars]
